name: Homethings
description: The home & personal playground built using Go, Next JS & Postgres DB. The app features a number of toy projects including a custom built search engine, personal to do app, document storage as well as others. A companion mobile is available built using React Native.

name: Webiliti
description: The web testing app built using SvelteKit & Hono. The SvelteKit app has the majority of the functionality with a few serverless api routes to handle communication with a seperate Hono app. The app runs a number of tests on a given page to allow a user to track web performance over time.

name: Finly & Umda
description: Finly is a personal finance app built using Go, Echo & Postgres. The app is designed to help users track their spending and money habits. Umda is a companion API that holds relevant market data for the app.
